Alternate Contact: Director of Maintenance Enforement, Ministry of Justice; Phone: 1.604.660.2528; Fax: 1.604.660.3728
Service Details: - Third party that monitors and enforces maintenance orders and agreements for either child support or spousal support- Collects payments made voluntarily or initiates enforcement action if necessary
Eligibility: Anyone with a maintenance order or agreement who lives in BC
How to Apply: Enrollment forms available from the website, the Kelowna Courthouse, the Kelowna ServiceBC Centre, the Kelowna Employment and Assistance Office, or you can call and ask that they be mailed to you
Address & Map: Northern and Interior Client OfficeBox 830Kamloops, BC     V2C 5N1View MapQuest Map
